document_data.name: ''Magic Eating''
document_data.mainbody: '''Magic eating''' was a [[armor quality|special quality]] that could be applied to [[armor]] that offered the wearer protection from magic.
document_data.Description: Armors [[item enchantment|enchanted]] with the ''magic eating'' property were often crafted with spiraling decorations and the depiction of many-fanged mouths.
document_data.Powers: ''Magic eating'' armor offered moderate degree of spell resistance, and could absorb the energy from spells cast directly at the wearer. It even bolstered their lifeforce for a short while.
document_data.Creation: Armor with this property were crafted using the spells ''[[Simbul's synostodweomer]]'' and ''[[spell resistance]]''.
